name: Moonshine Cybin
description: Moonshine is a Crick elf druid with a penchant for earthy and fungal magic. She's deeply connected to nature, frequently using her symbiotic entity abilities to wreak havoc on enemies with toxic spores. With an Appalachian flair, Moonshine combines humor, hospitality, and dangerous ingenuity, making her a chaotic but caring member of the party.

name: Hardwon Surefoot
description: Hardwon is a hardy human fighter with a rugged demeanor but occasionally clumsy tendencies. Committed to heroism but prone to bouts of hubris, he's the tank of the group, often charging headfirst into battle, sometimes at great personal risk. His pride sometimes blinds him to teamwork, but his loyalty to his companions is undeniable.

name: Beverly Toegold V
description: Beverly is a young, optimistic halfling paladin drawing his code and strength from his upbringing in the Green Teens, an adventure-themed scouting group. His youthful demeanor often contrasts with the adult dangers he faces, but his determination to bring order and righteousness shines through. While lighthearted and idealistic, Beverly is a skilled tactician whose bravery belies his size.
